transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Kya hua madam raat ko 12 baje call aayegi kya?
Customer: Abhi call nahi aayi sir aapko?
Executive: Madam mere ko call aane nahi aane se matlab nahi hai mere ko aap ye batao finally jawab bola ji kis din payment refund ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Nahi jis din call se kya karna hai mujhe?
Executive: Call se sir ek bar final confirmation wo aapse lenge na uske bare mein kyuki jaise maine aapko bataya tha Google tak wahi karenge aage chal ke.
Customer: Ha to main wahi to keh raha hu na raat ko 12 baje thodi aayegi aapne bola 12 baje tak ka time de do aadha ghanta time main 3 baje call kar raha hu aapko.
Executive: Abhi turant mere pass koi information koi call koi messages kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Aisa to nahi hai koi call miss ho gayi ho aapse?
Executive: Matlab main jhooth bol raha hu aapse?
Executive: Sir jhooth ki baat nahi hai main ek sirf puch rahi hu agar kahi aap busy ho gaye nahi hua hai koi call miss nahi hui hai.
Executive: Koi bhi nahi hui.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir maine waise bola tha unse call karne ke liye ek bar main ek bar check karti hu call kyu nahi hua hai fir main aapko batati hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai madam mere ko jo hai refund ke liye kya karna padega mujhe aap wo bata do fir.
Executive: Isme sir main refund ke liye maine aapko bataya hi tha ki refund mere hath mein nahi hota hai refund isme kya hota hai ki team ke matlab senior team leti hai isme decision to wo jab sara.
Customer: To fir mere ko uska number de do na aap line pe lo usko kaun hai?
Executive: Line pe sir ye abhi wo hai nahi available ye ye meri aap complaint jo hai registered to kiya hai na aapne nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Complaint registered kiya hai even maine unke jo senior hai unse bhi tak bhi baat kar li hai ki aaj hi aise karke resolve karana hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Hmm. To ek bar aap isme final call le lo confirm karne ke liye fir iske bare mein aage ka process hume start karna padega iska.
Customer: Hmm. To unhone apne bhi senior se unse baat kari thi.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To fir kab tak final call hogi wo?
Executive: Wo main abhi ek ghante ke andar kara deti hu.
Customer: Madam subah aapne bola aadha ghante ke liye abhi ek ghante ke liye 3 baje main call kar raha hu utne time mein bola ji ab hamare chutti ka time ho gaya hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aise kaise jab maine aaj aapko bola hai ki aaj main call kara dungi yahi hai na main jab Friday se bar bar kisi cheez ke liye bol raha hu batate aa raha hu aur fir us cheez ko ignore kiya ja raha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: To aur kya sochega main ye cheez nahi sochega to?
Executive: Ignore nahi ho raha hai sir main aap agar unse baat karenge na to unhe aapko khud hi pata chal jayega ki matlab maine already forward kara hua tha Friday ko par Friday ko jaise closing ke wajah se time lag gaya tha jo main aapko bata rahi thi na month ka end.
Customer: To aaj to Friday aaj to Friday nahi hai aaj to Monday hai na.
Executive: Ha aaj aaj subah se subah se to 3 baj gaye na madam.
Customer: Aap sahi bol rahe hai tabhi main aapko bol rahi hu ki subah jaise aapka call karne ke liye bola tha 12 baje.
Customer: Kal maine parso bhi maine bola tha aapko Friday ko main 12 baje se aapko pehle call karati hu to maine 11:30 se pehle jab aapka call aaya usse pehle hi maine unhe sara sab kuch bata diya tha.
Customer: Hmm. Ki ek bar aap ispe call kar lena 12 baje se pehle kyuki maine ye apne words diye hue hai unhe.
Customer: Hmm. Theek hai to unhone chalti call ki unhone matlab apne senior se pucha ki sir aise aise case hai isme hume kya karna hai.
Customer: Hmm. To wo sari baat chal rahi thi par uske beech mein aapka call aaya tab maine aapko bola bhi tha.
Customer: Ki wo abhi baat chal rahi hai uske bare mein aadhe ghante mein main aapko call karati hu.
Customer: Hmm. To abhi kya update hai rukiye.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Ha to isme thoda sa isi cheez mein time lag raha hai warna ye process ho jayega maine aapko bola hi tha ki aaj aaj mein main aapko call kaise bhi kara lungi.
Customer: Nahi process kya hoga mam aaj?
Executive: Process ye hoga ki jo mere manager hai sir Mohammad Rashid wo aapko call karenge wo aapse sara concern puchenge ki aapka jo bhi conflict wala jo chal raha tha usme kya resolve raha hai kya aapko team ki side se koi support nahi mila hai matlab wo ek refund ka jo process hota hai na refund ka process mein hume ye follow karna hota hai ki aapko refund chahiye kyu matlab aapko panel mein kuch problem aa raha hai ya aapke account manager se koi problem hai ya aap kuch aur bhi problem hai kyuki ek refund ke liye hume aage bhi process karna hota hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To uske baad wo aapse confirm karenge ki refund aapko chahiye kyu agar wo confirm karne ke baad sari cheeze unhe theek lagti hai tab wo aage chal ke process karte hai.
Customer: Hmm. Ji.
Customer: To ye kab tak ho kab tak hoga?
Executive: Right sir wo matlab mere manager hai.
Customer: Ha to madam main wahi puch raha hu na kab tak ho jayega ye?
Executive: Ha ek second.
Executive: Sir main isme bas aapko 4 baje tak call karati hu.
Customer: Madam mere ko lag raha hai ki 4 baje tak bhi call nahi aayegi.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hai aa jayegi call mujhe laga abhi tak call aa gayi hogi aapko isliye maine aapko dobara call back nahi kari.
Customer: Mere pass call aa jati to main aapko dobara call karne ki avashyakta mujhe avashyakta nahi thi aur dusri baat ye hai ki aapke pass system mein updated ho jati hai bola ji kiski call aayi hai kiski nahi aayi hai kya cheez hai kya kya hua hai kya nahi hua hai.
Executive: Nahi sir ye wali jo aap logo aap logo ke pass already update ho jati hai ye sari cheez nahi hoti.
Executive: Update ho jati hai update ho jati hai par wo sirf STF mein dikhti hai wo hamare usme matlab notification nahi aata uska.
Customer: Notification nahi aata but but aapke pass update to ho jati hai na.
Executive: Ji ji ji update ho jati hai.
Customer: Ha ha to main bhi to wahi keh raha hu na.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe bas 4 baje tak ka time dijiye main karti hu aapko call karwati hu.
Customer: Jyada long madam jyada long time mang rahe ho aap 4 baje tak thoda.
Executive: Theek hai nahi wo aapki baat theek hai bas main call karati hu aapko aap thoda time dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Hmm. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know refund status.

- Customer says he has not received call.



Resolution:

- Executive said senior team takes refund decisions.

- Executive will arrange a call within an hour.

- Executive said manager will call to confirm refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call by 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, call, manager, process
